title: Stablecoin
description: A cryptocurrency that attempts to offer stability and generally (preferably) backed by a reserve asset. USD Tether and USD Coin are examples of stablecoins backed by US dollars.

props.body: A cryptocurrency that attempts to offer stability and generally (preferably) backed by a reserve asset. USD Tether and USD Coin are examples of stablecoins backed by US dollars.
